config.hpp

00001 // note lack of include guards.  This is intentional
00002

00009 
00010 //  See library home page at http://www.boost.org/libs/serialization
00011 
00012 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------// 
00013 
00014 // This header implements separate compilation features as described in
00015 // http://www.boost.org/more/separate_compilation.html
00016 
00017 #include <boost/config.hpp>
00018 #include <boost/detail/workaround.hpp>
00019 #include <boost/preprocessor/facilities/empty.hpp>
00020 
00021 // note: this version incorporates the related code into the the 
00022 // the same library as BOOST_ARCHIVE.  This could change some day in the
00023 // future
00024 
00025 // if BOOST_SERIALIZATION_DECL is defined undefine it now:
00026 #ifdef BOOST_SERIALIZATION_DECL
00027     #undef BOOST_SERIALIZATION_DECL
00028 #endif
00029 
00030 #ifdef BOOST_HAS_DECLSPEC // defined in config system
00031 // we need to import/export our code only if the user has specifically
00032 // asked for it by defining either BOOST_ALL_DYN_LINK if they want all boost
00033 // libraries to be dynamically linked, or BOOST_SERIALIZATION_DYN_LINK
00034 // if they want just this one to be dynamically liked:
00035 #if defined(BOOST_ALL_DYN_LINK) || defined(BOOST_SERIALIZATION_DYN_LINK)
00036     #if !defined(BOOST_DYN_LINK)
00037         #define BOOST_DYN_LINK
00038     #endif
00039     // export if this is our own source, otherwise import:
00040     #if defined(BOOST_SERIALIZATION_SOURCE)
00041         #if defined(__BORLANDC__)
00042             #define BOOST_SERIALIZATION_DECL(T) T __export
00043         #else
00044             #define BOOST_SERIALIZATION_DECL(T) __declspec(dllexport) T
00045         #endif
00046     #else
00047         #if defined(__BORLANDC__)
00048             #define BOOST_SERIALIZATION_DECL(T) T __import
00049         #else
00050             #define BOOST_SERIALIZATION_DECL(T) __declspec(dllimport) T
00051         #endif
00052     #endif // defined(BOOST_SERIALIZATION_SOURCE)
00053 #endif // defined(BOOST_ALL_DYN_LINK) || defined(BOOST_SERIALIZATION_DYN_LINK)
00054 #endif // BOOST_HAS_DECLSPEC
00055 
00056 // if BOOST_SERIALIZATION_DECL isn't defined yet define it now:
00057 #ifndef BOOST_SERIALIZATION_DECL
00058     #define BOOST_SERIALIZATION_DECL(T) T
00059 #endif
00060 
00061 //  enable automatic library variant selection  ------------------------------// 
00062 
00063 #if !defined(BOOST_ALL_NO_LIB) && !defined(BOOST_SERIALIZATION_NO_LIB) \
00064 &&  !defined(BOOST_ARCHIVE_SOURCE) && !defined(BOOST_WARCHIVE_SOURCE)  \
00065 &&  !defined(BOOST_SERIALIZATION_SOURCE)
00066     //
00067     // Set the name of our library, this will get undef'ed by auto_link.hpp
00068     // once it's done with it:
00069     //
00070     #define BOOST_LIB_NAME boost_serialization
00071     //
00072     // If we're importing code from a dll, then tell auto_link.hpp about it:
00073     //
00074     #if defined(BOOST_ALL_DYN_LINK) || defined(BOOST_SERIALIZATION_DYN_LINK)
00075     #  define BOOST_DYN_LINK
00076     #endif
00077     //
00078     // And include the header that does the work:
00079     //
00080     #include <boost/config/auto_link.hpp>
00081 
00082 #endif
